item.title: An Introduction to Hockey Statistics
item.description: Vancouver Canucksâ€™ 2020 All-Stars: Quinn Hughes, left, Elias Pettersson, center, and Jacob Markstrom, right. (NHL.com) Welcome to Hockey By Numbers! This site will focus on looking at the game of hockey through the lens of statistics. A great place to start is with the basic stats available for teams, players, and goalies from the NHL. Team Statistics Table 1: Vancouver Canucks Season Statistics - February 11, 2020 Team GP W L OT P P% RW ROW S/O Win GF GA GF/GP GA/GP PP% PK% Net PP% Net PK% Shots/GP SA/GP FOW% Vancouver Canucks 57 31 21 5 67 0.
